attributes.action: force the winding up of the WNDC so that residents of Northampton are not shown stupid plans such as a 'Needle' by the train station
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The WNDC comes up with lots of stupid ideas to waste money that could be better spent of services that will benefit the residents of Northampton. Past plans have included a 'Needle' by the railway station, and a guided bus system that fell flat but have been revived by them. Recently thay have come up with an idea to put a 'TAX' of £20,000 on new houses, forcing the house prices higher still, and potentially making finding a home even more difficult for first time buyers.
